Name: Absorb Bulb
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Atk if the holder is hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

Name: Adrenaline Orb
Description: Boosts SPE when holder is intimidated.

Name: Air Balloon
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder will float in the air until hit. Once the holder is hit, this item will burst.

Name: Assault Vest
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.

Name: Big Root
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the amount of HP the holder restores from HP-stealing moves.

Name: Binding Band
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a band that increases the power of binding moves used by the holder.

Name: Black Belt
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This belt helps the wearer to focus and boosts the power of Fighting-type moves.

Name: Black Glasses
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a pair of shady-looking glasses that boost the power of Dark-type moves.

Name: Black Sludge
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It gradually restores HP to Poison-type Pokémon. It damages any other type.

Name: Blunder Policy
Description: Raises Speed sharply when a Pokémon misses with a move because of accuracy.

Name: Bright Powder
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It casts a tricky glare that lowers the opposing Pokémon's accuracy.

Name: Bug Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Bug-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Cell Battery
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Attack if the holder is hit with an Electric-type attack. It can only be used once.

Name: Charcoal
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a combustible fuel that boosts the power of Fire-type moves.

Name: Choice Band
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious headband boosts Attack but only allows the use of one move.

Name: Choice Scarf
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This curious scarf boosts Speed but only allows the use of one move.

Name: Choice Specs
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These curious glasses boost Sp. Atk but only allow the use of one move.

Name: Damp Rock
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Rain Dance when used by the holder.

Name: Dark Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Dark-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Destiny Knot
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the opposing Pokémon will be, too.

Name: Dragon Fang
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This hard and sharp fang boosts the power of Dragon-type moves.

Name: Dragon Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Dragon-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Dubious Disc
Description: A transparent device overflowing with dubious data. Its producer is unknown.

Name: Eject Button
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit by an attack, it will be switched out of battle.

Name: Eject Pack
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder's stats are lowered, it will be switched out of battle.

Name: Electric Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Electric-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Electric Seed
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Electric Terrain. It can only be used once.

Name: Everstone
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. A Pokémon holding this peculiar stone is prevented from evolving.

Name: Eviolite
Description: A mysterious evolutionary lump. When held by a Pokémon that can still evolve, it raises both Defense and Sp. Def.

Name: Fairy Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Fairy-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Fighting Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Fighting-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Fire Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Fire-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Float Stone
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This very light stone reduces the weight of a Pokémon when held.

Name: Flying Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Flying-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Focus Band
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder may endure a potential KO attack, leaving it with just 1 HP.

Name: Focus Sash
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder has full HP, it will endure a potential KO attack with 1 HP. The item then disappears.

Name: Full Incense
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense makes the holder bloated and slow moving.

Name: Ghost Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Ghost-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Grass Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Grass-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Grassy Seed
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Defense on Grassy Terrain. It can only be used once.

Name: Grip Claw
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of multi-turn attacks, such as Bind and Wrap.

Name: Ground Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Ground-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Heat Rock
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Sunny Day when used by the holder.

Name: Heavy-Duty Boots
Description: These boots prevent the effects of traps set on the battlefield.

Name: Ice Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Ice-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Icy Rock
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Hail when used by the holder.

Name: Iron Ball
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It lowers Speed and allows Ground-type moves to hit Flying types and holders that are levitating.

Name: King's Rock
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.

Name: Lagging Tail
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is tremendously heavy and makes the holder move slower than usual.

Name: Lax Incense
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The beguiling aroma of this incense may cause attacks to miss its holder.

Name: Leek
Description: An item to be held by Farfetch'd. This very long and stiff stalk of leek boosts its critical-hit ratio.

Name: Leftovers
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder's HP is slowly but steadily restored throughout every battle.

Name: Life Orb
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of moves but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

Name: Light Ball
Description: An item to be held by Pikachu. It's a puzzling orb that boosts its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Name: Light Clay
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Protective moves like Light Screen and Reflect will be effective longer.

Name: Luminous Moss
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def if the holder is hit with a Water-type attack. It can only be used once.

Name: Macho Brace
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This stiff, heavy brace helps Pokémon grow strong but cuts Speed in battle.

Name: Mental Herb
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder shakes off move-binding effects to move freely. It can be used only once.

Name: Metal Coat
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a special metallic film that can boost the power of Steel-type moves.

Name: Metal Powder
Description: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Defense stat.

Name: Metronome
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts moves used consecutively but only until a different move is used.

Name: Miracle Seed
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a seed imbued with life-force that boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

Name: Misty Seed
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Misty Terrain. It can only be used once.

Name: Muscle Band
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This headband exudes strength, slightly boosting the power of physical moves.

Name: Mystic Water
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This teardrop-shaped gem boosts the power of Water-type moves.

Name: Never-Melt Ice
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a heat- repelling piece of ice that boosts the power of Ice-type moves.

Name: Odd Incense
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.

Name: Poison Barb
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This small, poisonous barb boosts the power of Poison-type moves.

Name: Poison Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Poison-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Power Anklet
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Speed stat to grow more after battling.

Name: Power Band
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Sp. Def stat to grow more after battling.

Name: Power Belt
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Defense stat to grow more after battling.

Name: Power Bracer
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Attack stat to grow more after battling.

Name: Power Herb
Description: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows the holder to immediately use a move that normally requires a turn to charge.

Name: Power Lens
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's Sp. Atk stat to grow more after battling.

Name: Power Weight
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It reduces Speed but allows the holder's max HP to grow more after battling.

Name: Protective Pads
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These pads protect the holder from effects caused by making direct contact with the target.

Name: Psychic Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Psychic-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Psychic Seed
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Sp. Def on Psychic Terrain. It can only be used once.

Name: Pure Incense
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the head of the party.

Name: Quick Claw
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This light, sharp claw lets the bearer move first occasionally.

Name: Quick Powder
Description: An item to be held by Ditto. Extremely fine yet hard, this odd powder boosts the Speed stat.

Name: Razor Claw
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This sharply hooked claw increases the holder's critical-hit ratio.

Name: Razor Fang
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder successfully inflicts damage, the target may also flinch.

Name: Red Card
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. When the holder is hit by an attack, the attacker is removed from battle.

Name: Ring Target
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Moves that normally have no effect will land on a Pokémon holding it.

Name: Rock Incense
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Rock-type moves.

Name: Rock Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Rock-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Rocky Helmet
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder is hit, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

Name: Room Service
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Lowers Speed when Trick Room takes effect.

Name: Rose Incense
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This exotic-smelling incense boosts the power of Grass-type moves.

Name: Safety Goggles
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These goggles protect the holder from both weather-related damage and powder.

Name: Scope Lens
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a lens for scoping out weak points. It boosts the holder's critical-hit ratio.

Name: Sea Incense
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This incense has a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

Name: Sharp Beak
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a long, sharp beak that boosts the power of Flying-type moves.

Name: Shed Shell
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This discarded carapace enables the holder to switch out of battle without fail.

Name: Shell Bell
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder restores a little HP every time it inflicts damage on others.

Name: Silk Scarf
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a sumptuous scarf that boosts the power of Normal-type moves.

Name: Silver Powder
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a shiny silver powder that will boost the power of Bug-type moves.

Name: Smoke Ball
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to flee from any wild Pokémon encounter without fail.

Name: Smooth Rock
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the move Sandstorm when used by the holder.

Name: Snowball
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts Attack if the holder is hit with an Ice-type attack. It can only be used once.

Name: Soft Sand
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a loose, silky sand that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.

Name: Soothe Bell
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The comforting chime of this bell calms the holder, making it friendly.

Name: Spell Tag
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a sinister, eerie tag that boosts the power of Ghost-type moves.

Name: Steel Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Steel-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Sticky Barb
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It damages the holder every turn and may latch on to Pokémon that touch the holder.

Name: Terrain Extender
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of the terrain caused by the holder's move or Ability.

Name: Throat Spray
Description: Raises Sp. Atk when a Pokémon uses a sound-based move.

Name: Toxic Orb
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a bizarre orb that will badly poison the holder during battle.

Name: Twisted Spoon
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This spoon is imbued with telekinetic power and boosts Psychic-type moves.

Name: Utility Umbrella
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This sturdy umbrella protects the holder from the effects of weather.

Name: Water Memory
Description: A memory disc that contains Water-type data. It changes the type of the holder if held by a certain species of Pokémon.

Name: Wave Incense
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This incense has a curious aroma that boosts the power of Water-type moves.

Name: Weakness Policy
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. Attack and Sp. Atk sharply increase if the holder is hit with a move it's weak to.

Name: White Herb
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It will restore any lowered stat in battle. It can be used only once.

Name: Wide Lens
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It's a magnifying lens that slightly boosts the accuracy of moves.

Name: Wise Glasses
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This thick pair of glasses slightly boosts the power of special moves.

Name: Zoom Lens
Description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder moves after its target moves, its accuracy will be boosted.
